journal-meta.journal-title: Proceedings of the Institution of Mechanical Engineers, Part H: Journal of Engineering in Medicine

article-meta.issue-title: Includes a special section on musculoskeletal modelling of the lower limb

p.bold: Wear of moderately cross-linked polyethylene in fixed-bearing total knee replacements

abstract.p: Claire L Brockett, Louise M Jennings, Catherine Hardaker and John Fisher

The authors would like to bring attention to the error published in ‘Wear of moderately cross-linked polyethylene in fixed-bearing total knee replacements’ Proceedings of the IMechE Part H: J. Engineering in Medicine, 2012, Vol. 226(7), pp. 529–535, doi 10.1177/0954411912445265

body.p: The Funding statement contained errors, the corrected Funding paragraph has been reproduced below.

fn.label: Funding
fn.p: This work was supported by the NIHR, Leeds Musculoskeletal Biomedical Research Unit (LMBRU) and WELMEC - a centre of excellence in medical engineering funded by the Wellcome Trust and EPSRC, under grant number WT 088908/Z/09/Z.
